title: Vodka made better with Brita
body: <p><a title="Ern" href="http://ern.hopto.org/blog">Ern</a> sent me a link to this <a href="http://www5.ohmygoditburns.com/index.php?p=4" title="how the vodka market collapsed thanks to home vodka filtration">new amazing discovery</a>. Apparently Grey Goose, Belvedere, and Ketel One can all suck it, thanks to Brita water filters.  I haven't confirmed the experiment (yet!) but I'm always looking for a reason to buy that giant bottle of Kamchatka vodka.</p><p>[UPDATE]: I tried this out this past weekend. After 5 passes Mr. Boston was easier to drink than Grey Goose.</p>
